title: 2/bd 2/ba, Separate dining area, in Denver CO
posting_body: Embrace classic comfort and contemporary style at 3300 Tamarac Apartments, in Denver's Hampden neighborhood.
Our collection of refined studio, 1 & 2 bedroom apartments offer you a place to rest, relax, and have a little fun.
From our relaxed modern style and upscale social spaces to chic interiors, youll be ready to unwind in no time.

Wood-style plank flooring in kitchen and living areas-Oversized closets-Separate dining area-Energy efficient appliances including built-in microwave, refrigerator, and dishwasher                                                                                                                                select units                                                                                                                                Featured amenity-Private balcony or patio                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Featured amenity-Fireplaces available-Ceiling fans in living areas and bedrooms-Elevator access-Renovated unit-9-foot ceilings
